text:
Currently, all Event log entries created through NTEventLogAppender have event 
ID 4096 and event category of 30001, 40001 etc. depending on the Level.

I would like to have a way to customize the above two.
creator: Preetha.KP@siemens.com

text: Would an event ID and a category ID offset (to add) be sufficient?
creator: thorbjoern@gmail.com
